fixed_skill.desc: Deal X% Curse damage to 1 foe. Decrease Defense by X% for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Bewitching Sound

innate_skill.desc: Decrease Speed by 6. Increase HP by 15%.
innate_skill.name: Ironclad Resolve I

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 53.1/55.8/58.4% of Attack. 29.5/31.0/32.4% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mabufu

passive_skill.desc: When any ally attacks a Marked foe, increase Attack by 15%.
passive_skill.name: Hunting

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 36.0%/38.5%/41.0% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
